activities.description: Food and some activities priced separately

schedule.title: Festival Gates Open
schedule.description: Welcome to the 2nd Annual Boston Mountain Pawpaw Festival!

schedule.title: Pawpaw Dessert Vendors
schedule.description: Sample and purchase amazing pawpaw ice cream, pies, breads, cookies, and more from local vendors

schedule.title: Pawpaw Growing Workshop
schedule.description: Learn how to cultivate your own pawpaw trees with expert growers
schedule.speaker: Dr. Jane Smith, Horticulturist

schedule.title: Live Music: Dreadful Day
schedule.description: Enjoy live performances throughout the day on the main stage

schedule.title: Cornhole Tournament
schedule.description: Test your skills in our pawpaw-themed cornhole tournament. Prizes for winners!

schedule.title: Pawpaw Pageant
schedule.description: Crown the 2025 Pawpaw King and Queen in this fun, family-friendly pageant

vendors.name: Sweet Pawpaw Treats
vendors.description: Homemade pawpaw ice cream, cookies, and candies

vendors.name: Mountain Valley Ice Cream
vendors.description: Artisanal pawpaw ice cream in unique flavors

vendors.name: Ozark Native Plants
vendors.description: Pawpaw seedlings and native plant starts

faqs.question: What is a pawpaw?
faqs.answer: The pawpaw is North America's largest native edible fruit, with a tropical flavor often described as a cross between banana and mango.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have free parking in our main lot and overflow field. Accessible parking is available near the main entrance.

faqs.question: Can I bring my dog?
faqs.answer: Well-behaved dogs on leashes are welcome! We even have a pet costume contest as part of the Pawpaw Pageant.

faqs.question: What if it rains?
faqs.answer: The festival will proceed rain or shine! Some activities will move under tents or indoor spaces if needed.

faqs.question: Are pawpaw trees for sale?
faqs.answer: Yes! Several vendors will have pawpaw seedlings and young trees available for purchase.
